name: Lost Light (SacredBeans)
description:
A game by a group of students called Sacred Beans

DESCRIPTION -

Lost Light is 2D Puzzle game where you play as a Shrine Maiden who has been tasked with guiding lost spirits to the top of the mountain; however, the path is dark and the spirits have lost their way.

With the help of a lost fire spirit; jump, shoot and possess objects in order to solve the puzzles and re-light the lanterns.

CREDITS -

Level Designers: Samuel F, Tiffany R

Programmers: Samuel F, Timothy S

Character Artist: Sharlyn A

Environment Artists: Sharlyn A, Sophia R

UI Artist: Yazmin C

Asset Artists: Sharlyn A, Sophia R, Tiffany R
